item.title: A whale address holding 188.2 WBTC for 4 years has been transferred to Binance in the last 2 days
item.description: On August 7th, based on on-chain data analyst ChainInfo, a whale address transferred 188.2 WBTC (approximately $21.55 million) that it had been hoarding for 4 years to Binance in the past 2 days, realizing a profit of $10.93 million.It is reported that the address withdrew WBTC from Binance in April 2021 when the price was $56,420. After holding it for 4 years, the whale began to transfer WBTC to Binance 2 days ago, and the final transfer took place 20 minutes ago. The average price at which it transferred to Binance was $114,498.

item.title: Glassnode: Market Needs Short-Term Rebound to Reassure New Investors, On-Chain Data Indicates Speculative Fervor Has Cooled
item.description: July 15th. The on-chain data analysis firm Glassnode presented its latest On-chain Weekly Report, with the title "The Bitcoin Market Stepping into a Liquidity Vacuum Phase: The Duel between Key Support and Demand Recovery".In the report, Glassnode referred to data indicating that after reaching a new all-time high of $123,000 in mid-July, Bitcoin entered a consolidation stage. Currently, the price has dropped below a supply-dense area centered around $116,000. On July 31st, the price further broke through the lower limit of this range and slipped into a liquidity-scarce "air gap" extending down to $110,000. Although there was some dip-buying behavior, the market has not yet regained the key resistance level.The profit ratio of short-term holders has decreased from 100% to 70%. If demand does not rebound promptly, the confidence of new investors may wane, resulting in increased selling pressure. Meanwhile, on August 5th, Bitcoin ETFs witnessed a net outflow of 1,500 BTC, mark

item.title: Galaxy Digital-Backed MetaCene Parent Company Secures Dreampoint Holdings Investment at $100 Million Valuation
item.description: July 8th, a Hong Kong-listed company, Drin Holdings (01709.HK), announced that its managed private equity fund has made an investment in the parent company of the AI large-scale model game MetaCene with a valuation of $100 million. The two parties will also enhance their cooperation in RWA, stablecoin issuance, and Drin will also be involved in the management of its asset MAK.MetaCene, which has received investments from institutions like Galaxy Digital, is dedicated to constructing a decentralized gaming ecosystem. Launched last year, MetaCene has gained popularity in the Korean market. It is reported that MetaCene will drive a grand world-view game matrix by introducing an LLM built on a cluster of large-scale NVIDIA graphics cards and based on MAK.

item.title: TST experienced a flash crash this morning, plummeting by 70%. Trading volume on Binance's futures market surged by 1855%.
item.description: July 8th. Based on market data, Test (TST) witnessed a significant plunge of approximately 70% at 9:00 a.m. Beijing time this morning. The highest point within the 1-hour candle reached $0.0496, the lowest point reached $0.01547, and it is currently trading at $0.0267. The market capitalization is temporarily reported to be $25.33 million, and the TST/USDT spot trading pair on Binance has a 24-hour trading volume of $50.37 million.It is worthy of note that during the price crash of the TST/USDT spot trading pair, the trading volume reached $15.95 million within 1 hour. Subsequently, when the price stabilized at a low level, the 1-hour trading volume once again reached $12.25 million. As of the time of writing, the current total TST network contract position is reported to be $25.7616 million, with a decrease of 28.86% in the last 24 hours.Furthermore, the total trading volume of the TST/USDT contract trading pair across all platforms in the past 24 hours reached $266 million, with

item.title: An address shorting ETH at 15x leverage increased their short position by 1424 ETH.
item.description: On August 7th, according to the monitoring of Hyperinsight, a certain contract whale address has just increased its short position by 1,424.37 ETH, which is equivalent to $5,338,241. Currently, the overall ETH position of the whale is in an unrealized loss of $93,000. Its current ETH short position is valued at $18,440,000 (with a 15x leverage), and the average entry price is $3,678.

item.title: OMNI Surpasses $4.8, 24h Change +26.4%
item.description: On August 7th, according to HTX market data, OMNI has surpassed $4.8 and is currently priced at $4.83, with a 24-hour increase of 26.4%.

item.title: Within 24 hours of its launch, Pendle's funding rate trading platform Boros saw its first parameter adjustment.
item.description: On August 7th, as per an official announcement, Pendle's newly launched funding rate trading platform, Boros, went live for just 24 hours. Based on market activity, the platform made its first key parameter adjustment:- The open interest (OI) cap on the BTC/USDT trading pair on Binance was raised from $10 million to $15 million.- The BTC vault limit was increased from $26,000 to $40,000.

item.title: Binance: Users with at least 200 Alpha Points can claim a 1000 X Token airdrop
item.description: On August 7th, as per official channels, the trading of TaleX (X) on Binance Alpha is set to commence on August 7, 2025, at 11:00 (UTC). After the trading starts, users who possess at least 200 Binance Alpha points will be qualified to receive a 1000 X token airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. In case the reward pool is not completely distributed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour. It should be noted that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Alpha points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha activity page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the claim.

item.title: Binance Alpha: INFINIT (IN) Airdrop Threshold 200 Points
item.description: On August 7th, according to an official announcement, Binance Alpha and Futures will list INFINIT (IN). The opening time for Alpha Trading is August 7, 2025, at 17:00 (UTC+8). The opening time for Futures Trading is August 7, 2025, at 18:30 (UTC+8). After the trading begins, users holding at least 200 Alpha Points can claim a 500 IN token airdrop. It's first come, first served until the airdrop pool is exhausted or the event comes to an end.

item.title: Bitunix Analyst: Chip Tariff Exemption Conditions News Released, Technology and Blockchain Intersecting Focus, Suggests Keeping an Eye on AI Race Coins Support and Rotation Opportunities
item.description: On August 7th, US President Trump announced a 100% tariff on imported semiconductor products. There is an exemption for companies committed to building factories in the US, which benefits Apple (AAPL) and several other tech giants. Apple and CEO Cook simultaneously unveiled a $100 billion US manufacturing investment plan to expand their domestic supply chain layout. This move has been regarded by the market as Trump's policy of "using tariffs to force fund repatriation" being specifically carried out.In the crypto market, cryptocurrencies related to AI, computing power, and decentralized supply chains have witnessed capital replenishment. Although the overall crypto market has not yet broken out of its consolidation phase, the market remains highly sensitive to the themes of AI infrastructure and US manufacturing.Bitunix Analyst's Recommendation:This event reinforces US policy control over the tech supply chain and indirectly benefits AI and high-performance computing themes.
